lead_paragraph: RESTA-FLARER-- Francesco, M.D. - Anesthesiologist and connoisseur of art, wine, fashion, and culture, Franco died at the age of 66 on Thursday, June 16th. He was a devoted father, a dedicated physician, and a mentor to many, both old and young. His wife Bonnie, of 33 years, predeceased him in 2011. He is survived by his children, Morgan and Tessa, his daughter-in-law, Becky, and his granddaughter, Amelia, as well as his partner, Dorota Smyczek, and her family. He is also survived by his mother, Mariavica, his brother Nicola, and several nephews in Italy. A service will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel on Sunday, June 19th at 12:00. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RESTA, FLARER, FRANCESCO
